document.discussion_title: Photos: Tuface's Degree Conferment Ceremony at Igbinedion University - The Herald News Nigeria
document.topic_text: For tips, info and other correspondence, contact [email protected] Today’s Quote “There’s a particular masquerade in the south east, it takes 100 people to dress him, another 100 people to undress him. If this masquerade is well-packaged, it can provide employment in one week for more than 1000 young men. ” - Lai Mohammed.
